document_data.name: Jharakphred
document_data.deathnotes: Assassinated by [[blueflame ghost]]s working for [[Marlin Stormserpent]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Jharakphred''' was a painter in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century.
document_data.Personality: Jharakphred was nervous, whimpering and simpering.
document_data.Abilities: The man was perhaps the best painter-for-hire in [[Suzail]].
document_data.Activities: He was a painter for hire.
document_data.History: Jharakphred was hired by [[Marlin Stormserpent]] to paint the likenesses of [[Draskos Crownsilver]] and [[Gariskar Dauntinghorn]], whom the painter followed for days until their retinues beat him away. He then painted their likenesses and brought them to Marlin. After being paid, he was quickly skewered by two [[blueflame ghost]]s, [[Relve Langral]] and [[Treth Halonter]], who threw his body into a furnace, again, on Marlin's orders.
